oracle.adf.view.rich.event

Interface ActiveDataListener


  • public interface ActiveDataListener
    Listener called by an ActiveDataModel to inform the DataUpdateManager that the ActiveDataModel has changed.
    See Also:
    ActiveDataModel.startActiveData(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>, int, oracle.adf.view.rich.event.ActiveDataListener), ActiveDataModel.stopActiveData(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>, oracle.adf.view.rich.event.ActiveDataListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dataChanged(ActiveDataUpdateEvent event)
      Called by ActiveDataModel instances to inform the listener that the model has changed
      void handleActiveDataExcepton(ActiveDataExceptionEvent event)
      Called by ActiveDataModel to inform the listener that exception occurs

    • Method Detail

      • dataChanged

        void dataChanged(ActiveDataUpdateEvent event)
        Called by ActiveDataModel instances to inform the listener that the model has changed

        Parameters:
        event - The active data event fired from ActiveDataModel
        See Also:
        ActiveDataUpdateEvent

      • handleActiveDataExcepton

        void handleActiveDataExcepton(ActiveDataExceptionEvent event)
        Called by ActiveDataModel to inform the listener that exception occurs

        Parameters:
        event - The exception event fired from ActiveDataModel
        See Also:
        ActiveDataExceptionEvent
